name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Themes for Facebook and Picture in Picture

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes themes, dark themes for Facebook and Adds Picture in Picture mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Change the Facebook theme. 
- You also can create new theme for Facebook. 
- There are a lot of themes, including dark theme. 
- Enable Picture in Picture on all sites when you are watching video.

How to use:
- Open Facebookâ„¢.
- Open the option page.
- Choose a theme to apply for Facebook.

--------
Hope you enjoy it !
